TopicTitle: Do you have a screenshot that makes you laugh every time?

Articles.Content:
This thread must not die.

<iframe data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?app=core&module=system&controller=embed&url=http://imgur.com/1YH6H1C" style="height:416px;"></iframe>

My first Kraken attack...the Dwarf I just freaking exploded after leaving timewarp.

<iframe data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?app=core&module=system&controller=embed&url=http://imgur.com/aQnpIv0" style="height:416px;"></iframe>

Glub?

I present to you, a common case of not-enough-strut-itus:

![Mg8HDFQ.png](http://i.imgur.com/Mg8HDFQ.png)

Also, this is what happens when you let MechJeb handle docking.

![6d6S6ww.png](http://i.imgur.com/6d6S6ww.png)

**Edited <time datetime="2017-07-06T16:16:07Z" title="07/06/2017 04:16  PM" data-short="7 yr">July 6, 2017</time> by joacobanfield**

A couple of "on set" accidents that occurred in the making of [2010: The Year We Make Kontakt](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/153856-2010-the-year-we-make-kontakt-chapter-7-final-performance-last-chapter/#comment-2896763)

Dr Heywood Keman suffering a little "out of phase" incident on the flight deck of the Diskovery.

![13w67Gu.png](https://i.imgur.com/13w67Gu.png)

No technobabble involved in this little disaster, just shoddy workmanship in the construction of the set of the Diskovery's pod bay.![llM8NhP.png](https://i.imgur.com/llM8NhP.png)
My profile pic. It was taken when Jeb was flying towards the ground at 150 M/s. ![:sticktongue:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue2.gif ":sticktongue:")

Not an in game screenshot as such, but it seems to fit.

<iframe allowfullscreen="" data-controller="core.front.core.autosizeiframe" data-embedid="embed9626744357" scrolling="no" src="https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?app=core&module=system&controller=embed&url=https://twitter.com/kurtjmac/status/908796013137223680" style="height:965px;"></iframe>

Kurt was part of the reason I found KSP in the first place, and he may just have reignited my interest in it again there ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

[https://imgur.com/WP8dRhC](https://imgur.com/WP8dRhC)

I don't really know what has happened to this... It just appear in my screenshots folder one day.

***hi***

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-13T03:36:04Z" title="04/13/2018 03:36  AM" data-short="6 yr">April 13, 2018</time> by Cmdr Hawkeyez**

![dyleW7t.png](https://i.imgur.com/dyleW7t.png)

Kerbal Multiplayer is definitely not broken

My first successful Laythe landing.

![Landing.jpg](http://misanthropia.com/images/KSP/Landing.jpg)

> 
> 
> On 9/23/2017 at 9:26 AM, ThreeMartiniLaunch said:
> 
> 
> My first successful Laythe landing.
> 

I've had a few like that. Looks like an unplanned colonization is in the cards.

![hiHcStf.gif](https://i.imgur.com/hiHcStf.gif)

From 2013.  The result of attempting to refuel a seaplane from a floating fuel tank using the <abbr title="Kerbal Attachment System (mod)">KAS</abbr> winch, which in those days was all we had.  The plane wasn't completely stopped, its drifting relative to the tank caused the winch cable to intersect part of the plane, and then The Kraken attacked.
![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif ":P")    [KSP Glitch](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uNih8txREAc)

Jeb & Bill were taking the new two seater out for a quick spin around the planet, when Bill decided to get out and stretch his legs.  Poor Jeb near jumped out of his space suit when he looked up... 

![DIUAVYK.png](https://imgur.com/DIUAVYK.png)I always have to chuckle at Bill peering through the window! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif ":D")

**Edited <time datetime="2017-10-23T20:51:27Z" title="10/23/2017 08:51  PM" data-short="6 yr">October 23, 2017</time> by The Flying Kerbal**

`nuff said

![c74QMHp.png](https://i.imgur.com/c74QMHp.png)

Will have to check if I got a shot of it, but I had a great moment this morning.  Jeb is flying a giant rover/base from the Cupola during liftoff, Val and Bill in the HitchHiker below him.  Jeb is doing his thing, showing a bit of strain from being in command of this 300+ part slideshow behemoth that's riding atop two Mammoth stacks and four Kickbacks.  Bill is grinning like an idiot, singing, and doing a little dance in pure Enginerd glee.  Val... well, Val is glaring at Bill and wishing a hole would open in their module and suck him out around 40 km up without a helmet. 

I can only imagine what all the newbies in the backseats were doing... probably praying to the Kraken and wondering how big a splat they would be if they tried to get up and grab some snacks at that moment.  I have a feeling Bob was scooting just a little further away in his seat from the new girl scientist and mumbling death threats at Jeb.

The incredible possibilities the randomely names generator offers to us...

![6n1JqoJ.png](https://i.imgur.com/6n1JqoJ.png)

![9NKeRZ2.png](https://i.imgur.com/9NKeRZ2.png)................................................................

![xmoLKCE.png](https://i.imgur.com/xmoLKCE.png)

Even Barnie could not retain himself from laughing at her.

I think this image works best without context.

![UoGHYJF.jpg](https://i.imgur.com/UoGHYJF.jpg)

A few days ago I tried to design a super huge orbital rocket.

![QmWAcuF.png](https://i.imgur.com/QmWAcuF.png)

Every. Single. Time.

> 
> 
> On 6/10/2015 at 6:53 AM, lajoswinkler said:
> 
> 
> Here's Val doing the checkup of The Toilet, or perhaps she survived when Jeb destroyed the facility while she was pooping.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> It's not really hilarious, but it does give me a chuckle.
> 
> 
> 
> 
> ![345E530D7F5195A0FFD075B74D54C413DA867099](http://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/28488725023578112/345E530D7F5195A0FFD075B74D54C413DA867099/)
> 

You know now that i think of it. That toilet is a little too big for kerbals.

I posted this on the fan art thread awhile ago but here it is anyway.

![KArLjmx.png](https://i.imgur.com/KArLjmx.png)

![Ccml1Le.png](https://i.imgur.com/Ccml1Le.png)

"whats jeb doing out there?"
